amendment.description: Amendment allows school personnel to discipline students with disabilities who carry or possess weapons in the same manner as those students without disabilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 39 and printed in Part A of H.Rept. 106-186 to allow school personnel to discipline students with disabilities who carry or possess weapons in the same manner as those students without disabilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norwood amendment (A036) Agreed to by recorded vote: 300 - 128 (Roll no. 227).
